articles.title: Death rates in admitted Covid-19 patients higher in Africa than rest of the world - study - News24
articles.description: A lack of life-saving equipment in hospitals might be the reason for high Covid-19 death rates in Africa, a study has found.
articles.content:

articles.title: ISWAP is not eligible for $7m bounty placed on Shekau – US - Guardian
articles.description: The United States Department Rewards for Justice Program has said that the $7 million bounty placed on the leader of the Boko Haram sect, Abubakar Shekau, will not be given to members of the Islamic State in West Africa Province.
